mapper.select: select employee.*, dm_name, po_name, st_type from employee RIGHT join department on dm_num = ep_dm_num RIGHT join position on po_num = ep_po_num RIGHT join status on st_num = ep_st_num ORDER BY ep_id;
mapper.update: update employee set ep_name = #{dbEp.ep_name}, ep_email = #{dbEp.ep_email}, ep_phone_num = #{dbEp.ep_phone_num}, ep_dm_num = #{dbEp.ep_dm_num}, ep_po_num = #{dbEp.ep_po_num}, ep_st_num = #{dbEp.ep_st_num}, ep_leave = #{dbEp.ep_leave}, ep_salay = #{dbEp.ep_salay} where ep_id = #{dbEp.ep_id}
